description:
# COE-001: Basic Command Execution

## Overview
Demonstrates the fundamental building block of automation - executing a single command to validate connectivity and permissions. This is your "Hello World" for Process Automation.

## Job Metadata

| Property | Value |
|----------|-------|
| **Author** | PagerDuty CoE Team |
| **Version** | 1.0.0 |
| **Average Runtime** | ~5 seconds |
| **Timeout** | 30 seconds |

## Prerequisites

| Requirement | Validation |
|-------------|------------|
| Runner Agent | Connectivity check via health endpoint |
| Target Node | SSH/WinRM access configured |
| Execute Permissions | User context validated |

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Default | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|---------|-------------|
| None | - | - | - | This job requires no user input |

## Exit Codes

| Code | Status | Description |
|------|--------|-------------|
| 0 | Success | Command executed and returned current user |
| 1 | Failure | Command execution failed or timeout |

## Learning Objectives

- Understand job execution basics
- Verify runner connectivity
- Validate node permissions
- Review job execution logs

---

**Use Case:** Foundation for all automation jobs | **Difficulty:** Beginner

# COE-001: Basic Command Execution

# COE-001: Basic Command Execution

## Overview
Demonstrates the fundamental building block of automation - executing a single command to validate connectivity and permissions. This is your "Hello World" for Process Automation.

## Job Metadata

| Property | Value |
|----------|-------|
| **Author** | PagerDuty CoE Team |
| **Version** | 1.0.0 |
| **Average Runtime** | ~5 seconds |
| **Timeout** | 30 seconds |

## Prerequisites

| Requirement | Validation |
|-------------|------------|
| Runner Agent | Connectivity check via health endpoint |
| Target Node | SSH/WinRM access configured |
| Execute Permissions | User context validated |

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Default | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|---------|-------------|
| None | - | - | - | This job requires no user input |

## Exit Codes

| Code | Status | Description |
|------|--------|-------------|
| 0 | Success | Command executed and returned current user |
| 1 | Failure | Command execution failed or timeout |

## Learning Objectives

- Understand job execution basics
- Verify runner connectivity
- Validate node permissions
- Review job execution logs

---

**Use Case:** Foundation for all automation jobs | **Difficulty:** Beginner

## Execution

```bash
whoami
```

## Notes

- Job runs locally if no target nodes specified
- Variables are automatically extracted and created as job options
- Variable substitution rules:
  - Single-line commands: `${option.VARIABLENAME}` format
  - Multi-line scripts: `@option.VARIABLENAME@` format
name: COE-001: Basic Command Execution
